verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came אַחַר֙ <S%H310><s%> 'a-Char And it came to pass after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, these וְהָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ve-Ha-'E-lo-Him, that God נִסָּ֖ה <S%H5254><s%> nis-Sah did tempt אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham; Abraham וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham unto him Abraham וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and he said הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Ne-ni. Here

וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> kach- Take now נָ֠א <S%H4994><s%> na now אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בִּנְךָ֨ <S%H1121><s%> bin-Cha thy son אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְחִֽידְךָ֤ <S%H3173><s%> ye-chi-de-Cha thine only אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom אָהַ֙בְתָּ֙ <S%H157><s%> 'a-Hav-ta whom thou lovest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak, [son] Isaac וְלֶךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> ve-lech- and go לְךָ֔ le-Cha, אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz into the land הַמֹּרִיָּ֑ה <S%H4179><s%> ham-mo-ri-Yah; of Moriah וְהַעֲלֵ֤הוּ <S%H5927><s%> ve-ha-'a-Le-hu and offer him שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> sham there לְעֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> le-'o-Lah, there for a burnt offering עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al on אַחַ֣ד <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chad upon one הֶֽהָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> he-ha-Rim, of the mountains אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher of which אֹמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> 'o-Mar which I will tell אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha. about

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <S%H7925><s%> vai-yash-Kem rose up early אַבְרָהָ֜ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham And Abraham בַּבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker, in the morning וַֽיַּחֲבֹשׁ֙ <S%H2280><s%> vai-ya-cha-Vosh and saddled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חֲמֹר֔וֹ <S%H2543><s%> cha-mo-Ro, his ass וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁנֵ֤י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei two נְעָרָיו֙ <S%H5288><s%> ne-'a-Rav of his young men אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To, for וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et יִצְחָ֣ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak with him and Isaac בְּנ֑וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No; his son וַיְבַקַּע֙ <S%H1234><s%> vay-vak-Ka' and clave עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> 'a-Tzei the wood עֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lah, for the burnt offering וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom and rose up וַיֵּ֔לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech, and went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom unto the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- of which אָֽמַר־ <S%H559><s%> 'a-mar- had told ל֥וֹ lo הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him. of which God

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֗י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi, Then on the third וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> vai-yis-Sa lifted up אַבְרָהָ֧ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham Abraham אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֵינָ֛יו <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nav his eyes וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar and saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom the place מֵרָחֹֽק׃ <S%H7350><s%> me-ra-Chok. afar off

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אַבְרָהָ֜ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham And Abraham אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his נְעָרָ֗יו <S%H5288><s%> ne-'a-Rav, unto his young men שְׁבוּ־ <S%H3427><s%> she-vu- Abide לָכֶ֥ם la-Chem פֹּה֙ <S%H6311><s%> poh here עִֽם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with הַחֲמ֔וֹר <S%H2543><s%> ha-cha-Mor, ye here with the ass וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I וְהַנַּ֔עַר <S%H5288><s%> ve-han-Na-'ar, and I and the lad נֵלְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> ne-le-Chah will go עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against כֹּ֑ה <S%H3541><s%> Koh; yonder וְנִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֖ה <S%H7812><s%> ve-nish-ta-cha-Veh and worship וְנָשׁ֥וּבָה <S%H7725><s%> ve-na-Shu-vah and come again אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem. about

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took אַבְרָהָ֜ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham And Abraham אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> 'a-Tzei the wood הָעֹלָ֗ה <S%H5930><s%> ha-'o-Lah, of the burnt offering וַיָּ֙שֶׂם֙ <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem and laid עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on יִצְחָ֣ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak [it] upon Isaac בְּנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No, his son וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach and he took בְּיָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do, in his hand אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> ha-'Esh the fire וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַֽמַּאֲכֶ֑לֶת <S%H3979><s%> ham-ma-'a-Che-let; and a knife וַיֵּלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> vai-ye-le-Chu walked שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H8147><s%> she-nei-Hem both יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav. of them together

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer spake יִצְחָ֜ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak And Isaac אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַבְרָהָ֤ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham unto Abraham אָבִיו֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv his father וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אָבִ֔י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi, My father וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and he said הִנֶּ֣נִּֽי <S%H2009><s%> hin-Nen-ni Here בְנִ֑י <S%H1121><s%> ve-Ni; Here [am] I my son וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, And he said הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold הָאֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> ha-'Esh Behold the fire וְהָ֣עֵצִ֔ים <S%H6086><s%> ve-Ha-'e-Tzim, and the wood וְאַיֵּ֥ה <S%H346><s%> ve-'ai-Yeh where הַשֶּׂ֖ה <S%H7716><s%> has-Seh but where [is] the lamb לְעֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> le-'o-Lah. the burnt

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham, And Abraham אֱלֹהִ֞ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God יִרְאֶה־ <S%H7200><s%> yir-'eh- will provide לּ֥וֹ lo הַשֶּׂ֛ה <S%H7716><s%> has-Seh himself a lamb לְעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> le-'o-Lah for a burnt offering בְּנִ֑י <S%H1121><s%> be-Ni; My son וַיֵּלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> vai-ye-le-Chu walked שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H8147><s%> she-nei-Hem both of them יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav. together

וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u, And they came אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמָּקוֹם֮ <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-kOm to the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher of which אָֽמַר־ <S%H559><s%> 'a-mar- had told ל֣וֹ lo הָאֱלֹהִים֒ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him which God וַיִּ֨בֶן <S%H1129><s%> vai-Yi-ven built שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there אַבְרָהָם֙ <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham him of and Abraham אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach, an altar וַֽיַּעֲרֹ֖ךְ <S%H6186><s%> vai-ya-'a-Roch in order אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעֵצִ֑ים <S%H6086><s%> ha-'e-Tzim; the wood וַֽיַּעֲקֹד֙ <S%H6123><s%> vai-ya-'a-Kod and bound אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִצְחָ֣ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak Isaac בְּנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No, his son וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem and laid אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> o-To עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach, him on the altar מִמַּ֖עַל <S%H4605><s%> mi-Ma-'al upon לָעֵצִֽים׃ <S%H6086><s%> la-'e-Tzim. the wood

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach stretched forth אַבְרָהָם֙ <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham And Abraham אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do, his hand וַיִּקַּ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַֽמַּאֲכֶ֑לֶת <S%H3979><s%> ham-ma-'a-Che-let; the knife לִשְׁחֹ֖ט <S%H7819><s%> lish-Chot to slay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> be-No. his son

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav But מַלְאַ֤ךְ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'Ach And the angel יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim, unto him out of heaven וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אַבְרָהָ֣ם׀ <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham Abraham אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham; Abraham וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and he said הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Ne-ni. Here

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, And he said אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> tish-Lach Lay יָֽדְךָ֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-Cha not thine hand אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- upon הַנַּ֔עַר <S%H5288><s%> han-Na-'ar, the lad וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- nay תַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> Ta-'as neither do thou ל֖וֹ lo מְא֑וּמָּה <S%H3972><s%> me-'Um-mah; any thing כִּ֣י׀ <S%H3588><s%> ki for עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah unto him for now יָדַ֗עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ti, I know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for יְרֵ֤א <S%H3373><s%> ye-Re that thou fearest אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God אַ֔תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah, you וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo seeing thou hast not חָשַׂ֛כְתָּ <S%H2820><s%> cha-Sach-ta withheld אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בִּנְךָ֥ <S%H1121><s%> bin-Cha thy son אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְחִידְךָ֖ <S%H3173><s%> ye-chi-de-Cha thine only מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni. at

וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> vai-yis-Sa lifted up אַבְרָהָ֜ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham And Abraham אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֵינָ֗יו <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nav, his eyes וַיַּרְא֙ <S%H7200><s%> vai-yaR and looked וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-neh- and behold אַ֔יִל <S%H352><s%> 'A-yil, [him] a ram אַחַ֕ר <S%H310><s%> 'a-Char and behold behind נֶאֱחַ֥ז <S%H270><s%> ne-'e-Chaz caught בַּסְּבַ֖ךְ <S%H5442><s%> bas-se-Vach in a thicket בְּקַרְנָ֑יו <S%H7161><s%> be-kar-Nav; by his horns וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went אַבְרָהָם֙ <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham and Abraham וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאַ֔יִל <S%H352><s%> ha-'A-yil, the ram וַיַּעֲלֵ֥הוּ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Le-hu and offered him up לְעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> le-'o-Lah for a burnt offering תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat in the stead בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> be-No. of his son

וַיִּקְרָ֧א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called אַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham And Abraham שֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> shem- the name הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom of that place הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he יְהוָ֣ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD יִרְאֶ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> yir-'Eh; it shall be seen אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher as יֵאָמֵ֣ר <S%H559><s%> ye-'a-Mer it is said הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, [to] this day בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har In the mount יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD יֵרָאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> ye-ra-'Eh. will be provided

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And said בִּ֥י bi נִשְׁבַּ֖עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba'-ti By myself have I sworn נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> Ki, for יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an because אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher you עָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ta thou hast done אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and hast not חָשַׂ֖כְתָּ <S%H2820><s%> cha-Sach-ta withheld אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בִּנְךָ֥ <S%H1121><s%> bin-Cha thy son אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְחִידֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3173><s%> ye-chi-De-cha. thine only
